DOC.brief_title: Family History Prostate Cancer Patients Taiwan
DOC.detailed_description: We retrospectively review medical chart prostate cancer patient NTUH 1978 2002 . The initial presentation , systemic disease , smoke habit , clinical stage , Gleason score , pathological stage , treatment , outcome record . Post-hoc questionnaire complete OPD visit , admission visit , telephone interview mail . The questionnaire include family history prostate cancer , colon cancer , breast cancer , hepatoma . If patient pass away , first degree relative fill vacant position . The prevalence family history prostate cancer patient determine . The association family histories clinical presentation analyze . Besides , characteristic patient without response discuss .
